ReshiramCCMod.name: Reshiram
ReshiramCCMod.description:
<c=f4f7f0>RESHIRAM</c>
A legendary dragon that represents truth. Its cards utilize <c=ff687d>heat</c> alongside <c=boldPink>other debuffs</c> to set enemy ships ablaze.

Solar Flare.name: SUMMON SOLAR FLARE
Solar Flare.description: Changes the current field effect to <c=status>SOLAR FLARE</c>.

Non-Attack Stun.name: NON-ATTACK STUN
Non-Attack Stun.description: Cancel intents on the enemy ship that are not attacks.

SearingShotChooseExhaust.SelectText: Choose a card in your hand to exhaust for Searing Shot.

Exhaust Right.name: EXHAUST RIGHTMOST CARD
Exhaust Right.description: Exhaust the rightmost card in your hand.

Exhaust Left Right.name: EXHAUST LEFTMOST AND RIGHTMOST CARDS
Exhaust Left Right.description: Exhaust the leftmost and rightmost cards in your hand.

Choose Exhaust.name: CHOOSE A CARD TO EXHAUST
Choose Exhaust.description: Choose a card in your hand to exhaust.

Flame Orb.name: FLAME ORB
Flame Orb.description: Gain 1 extra <c=status>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Lose 1 <c=status>heat resist</c> at the start of combat.</c>

DNA Splicers.name: DNA SPLICERS
DNA Splicers.description: Add <c=card>Glaciate</c> and <c=card>Ice Burn</c> to your deck. Enemy starts combat with <c=status>THERMOSENSITIVE</c>.

Heat Rock.name: HEAT ROCK
Heat Rock.description: At start of combat, enemy gains 1 <c=status>FLAMMABLE</c>.

Fire Gem.name: FIRE GEM
Fire Gem.description: The first time you gain <c=status>heat</c> each turn, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>.

Rawst Berry.name: RAWST BERRY
Rawst Berry.description: The first time each combat you reach the <c=ff687d>overheating</c> threshold, reduce your heat to 1 below the threshold.

Liberty Pass.name: LIBERTY PASS
Liberty Pass.description: Add <c=card>Searing Shot</c> and <c=card>V-Create</c> to your deck.

description.A: Summon a <c=action>Solar Flare</c>. Gain 3 <c=status>heat resist</c> and 1 <c=status>serenity</c>.
description.B: <c=action>Solar Flare</c>, or apply 2 <c=status>flammable</c> if already active. Gain 2 <c=status>heat resist</c>.

description.None: Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.
description.A: Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.
description.B: Both ships gain 1 <c=status>heat</c>. Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.description: Beams 1 <c=status>heat</c> at its target once per turn.

Smoldering.name: SMOLDERING
Smoldering.description:
After <c=status>heat</c> is inflicted, take <c=boldPink>{0}</c> hull damage if at or above the <c=ff687d>overheating</c> threshold.
<c=ff687d>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

Safeguard.name: SAFEGUARD
Safeguard.description:
This ship cannot gain <c=status>heat</c>.
<c=ff687d>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

Heat Resist.name: HEAT RESIST
Heat Resist.description: This ship must gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> extra <c=status>heat</c> before <c=ff687d>overheating</c>.

Thermosensitive.name: THERMOSENSITIVE
Thermosensitive.description: Whenever this ship is inflicted with <c=status>heat</c> or <c=status>FROZEN</c>, one ship part is stunned at random.

Exhaust Energy.name: exhausted card's energy value
Exhaust Energy.description: Energy value of the card that was exhausted.
